title: Training Set Determination for Genomic Seleciton
text: package provides two useful tools determining proper training set genomic selection prediction. order better prediction genomic estimated breeding values (GEBV), training set optimized highly genomic correlated test set possible. Several criteria published previously, including: Prediction error variance (PEV; Akdemir et al., 2015) Generalized coefficient determination (CD; Laloë et al., 1993) research provides alternative criterion, r-score, derived Pearson’s correlation GEBVs phenotypic values test set. determine reasonable training set size optimal training set building prediction model criteria. functions provided package. information method, please check published article: Training set determination genomic selection (Ou et al., 2019)
